mapper.insert: insert into Goods(gnum, gstock, gprice, gname, gimg1, gimg2, gpoint, gcategory, gcategory2, member_mid) values((select ifnull(max(gnum),0)+1 from goods as gnum), #{gStock}, #{gPrice}, #{gName},#{gImg1},#{gImg2}, 0, #{gCategory}, #{gCategory2}, #{member_mId})
mapper.select: select * from Goods where gname like '${value}%' or gname like '%${value}%' or gname like '%${value}' or gcategory like '${value}%' or gcategory like '%${value}%' or gcategory like '%${value}' or gcategory2 like '${value}%' or gcategory2 like '%${value}%' or gcategory2 like '%${value}'
select g.gnum,g.gstock,g.gprice,g.gname,g.gdate,g.gimg1,g.gimg2,g.gpoint,g.gcategory,g.gcategory2,g.member_mid,m.mname company from Goods g,Member m where g.member_mid = m.mid and gnum = #{gNum};
select * from Goods where member_mid = #{member_mId} order by gdate desc
select * from Goods order by gdate desc limit 0, 12
select * from Goods order by gprice desc limit 0, 12
SELECT COUNT(GNUM) FROM Goods WHERE GNUM>0
select * from Goods where member_mId=#{member_mId} order by gdate desc limit #{sno}, #{perPageNum}
